title: Infernal Thresh (1820 RP)
body:
I saw a picture of this skin concept on google and can be a good idea to be added as a legendary skin
Include:
New Voice overs
New particles
New recall
New death and respawn animation.

Voice overs:
Souls are simply the singers of the flames.
Give up your mortal body.
Nightmares can be realised.
The screams are a song we all hear
Its the beginning of the end mortals
One word is all it takes
Ahhh...hypnotizing songs.
The trident is my toy.
Joke:
You are expecting somebody colder my friend?
The lantern lights my path... and makes me hotter.
Taunt:
Destruction awaits...
Your immortal soul is mine to keep.
Special interactions:
Enemy Infernal Nasus
What do you want Nasus DEATH?
Ahhh...Nasus feeling your courage leaving you?
Ally Infernal Nasus:
Gift them death Nasus!
Show them your powers Nasus!
When using Q:
Come back!
I sentence you to death!
Come and play with me!
When using W:
CATCH!!!
TO ME!!!
WHEN USING E:
Up you go
Now now join death!!!
When using R:
I WILL BE YOUR END!!!
NO ESCAPE!!!!
JOIN YOUR SOULMATES!!!

replies.body: The jokes and taunts kinda corny but cool skin for sure
(echo)

OOH!

#1 Question- what epic dance could he have to rival Nasus'?
I main Thresh please make this skin come true... {{item:3070}}
It can be Harlem Shake. First he does a random dance and then Infernal Mordekaiser and Infernal Alistar come out of his lantern like ghosts and they join dancing with him.
Run Devil Run{{champion:134}}
If you make it gift it to all summoners that have thresh bought :) {{champion:412}}

Harlem shake. First he dances alone and then Infernal Mordekaiser, Infernal Alistar like ghosts come out of his lantern and dance with him. That is my idea. But you all rioteers can change it if you dont like it. :)

> [{quoted}](name=dzokata,realm=EUNE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=wfaBUgiT,comment-id=00090002,timestamp=2015-04-11T07:41:55.469+0000)
>
> Harlem shake. 


......An EUNE more cheezy than an NA. facepalm

Quotes could use some work, but aside from that:

http://i793.photobucket.com/albums/yy216/TheSuperCrasher/WWE/9ayqtz.gif
No cheezy dances plz >.< Make his dance a sacrifical ritual instead

I love the concept. The quotes are striking me as a bit more Karthus though, except for the ability quotes.

Also, needs interactions with Lucian.
"Get over here" like scorpion from mortal kombat would have to be a must for the Q
This is a REALLY nice skin. PLEASE RITO

if graves cant have a cigar what makes you think thresh can literally be satan

i mean its cool, but rito
I am not English and i am not good at making quotes but if riot makes it they can add their quotes :) {{champion:412}}
Quotes are meh, but the skin looks cool. Would buy
Looks awesome, but I'd sooner have arclight Thresh imo.
i main Support & Thresh is my #1 Champion for this role so FCK YEAH i would be this skin
i fucking love it but  maybe work more on the quotes
